endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of medications with their details available in the database.
Submit a set of medications to analyze potential interactions.
Fetch details of a specific interaction alert by its unique identifier.
Assign a new prescription record to the specified patient.
Retrieve possible medication interactions for a specific patient.
Retrieve a list of recent interaction alerts generated by the system.
Dismiss a specific alert for a potential medication interaction.
Retrieve the inventory of medications available at a specific pharmacy.
Submit new or updated guidelines for medication safety and interaction handling.
Retrieve the current guidelines for evaluating medication interactions.
